jd: Hello,I am looking for the candidates regarding the following position::Lead Software Engineer ONLY CANDIDATES WITH GENUINE HEALTHCARE (EMR) EXPEREINCE NEEDEDONLY USC, H4 (Genuine visa copy required along with resume.)Remote Senior Software Engineer – Same skill set as architect with less experience – 7-10 years experience. Healthcare integration/migration EMR experience needed. He or she should be willing to be exposed to modern architecture and patterns. Needs to be exposed to REST API - .NET / JAVA (C#, Boot/Microservices). The tech stack has not been established. Needs to be exposed to messaging platforms like Kafka or any other streaming services. Full stack Is helpful - Leveraged in multiple UI discussions in the future – definitely will help being Full Stack with React/ Next.JS on the front end and headless architecture in a SaaS environment.
